name: Peach Caipirinha
description: Be sure to use ripe peach in this tart, refreshing spin on the classic Caipirinha.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Slice peach in quarters and place in cocktail shaker. Add lime juice and sugar, muddle well. Add cachaça and lime wedges, fill shaker with ice and shake until very cold, about 15 seconds. Pour unstrained into a rocks glass.
